title: NFL Power Rankings: Big jumps for the Colts and 49ers? How far did the Chargers fall?
content: We stacked every NFL team ahead of Week 6. Which teams rose into or fell out of the top 10? Plus, we have fantasy surprises on each roster.

title: Sources: OU's Mateer pushing to play vs. Texas
content: Oklahoma quarterback John Mateer is pushing to return for Saturday's game against Texas, sources told ESPN.

title: Jerry: Gesture to fans at MetLife was 'inadvertent'
content: Cowboys owner and general manager Jerry Jones said an "unfortunate" gesture made to fans in the MetLife Stadium stands on Sunday was "inadvertent."

title: Source: Optimism for CB Arnold after 2nd opinion
content: Lions CB Terrion Arnold, after a second opinion, found his shoulder injury isn't as bad as feared, and he could possibly return as soon as this month, a source told ESPN.

title: LeBron raises glass in 'decision of all decisions'
content: LeBron James teased a second "decision," which turned out to be an ad for Hennessy, the cognac brand with which James has been a longtime partner. The announcement prompted a boost in ticket prices for the Lakers' last regular-season game.

title: Tatum to assist Duke as hands-on player mentor
content: Duke said Tuesday that former Blue Devils player and Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum would serve in a volunteer advisory role for the program as "chief basketball officer."

title: Bills benched WR Coleman for disciplinary reasons
content: Buffalo Bills wide receiver Keon Coleman was benched for the first offensive series of Sunday night's loss to the New England Patriots for "discipline," head coach Sean McDermott said Monday.

title: Spain great Alba to retire after Miami season
content: Inter Miami defender Jordi Alba on Tuesday announced his decision to retire from soccer at the end of the 2025 MLS season.

title: 🔮 Why Giannis' future in Milwaukee is unsettled
content: In a transformative summer for the Bucks, the team had discussions about moving the two-time MVP to New York.

title: Why this season is different for 'perfect ambassador for the game' Sidney Crosby
content: Still one of the best players in the NHL,  could Crosby's future lie somewhere other than Pittsburgh?

title: Our early hot takes from the 2025 MLB playoffs
content: What can we learn from a week of MLB postseason baseball? Enough to make our experts go all-in on their boldest predictions.

title: Where is Aaron Judge's power this October?
content: Judge's stat line looks solid -- but his power has gone missing and the Yankees are on the brink of elimination.

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in, who's out, who has work to do in each league﻿
content: Putting the spotlight on select teams and questions around others as the early playoff picture takes shape.

title: How the John Elway-led Broncos of the mid-2010s grew an NFL general manager tree
content: The Broncos turned into a GM factory under Elway, as four current and two former GMs were in Denver under his Super Bowl-winning regime.

title: Men's Preseason Top 25: Who is No. 1? Plus risers and fallers in final month to tip
content: Does Purdue, Houston or Florida deserve the top spot? Find out in the last offseason edition of our rankings.

title: Women's college basketball Preseason Top 25 for 2025-26
content: The reigning champ and runner-up are 1-2. Who rounds out the rest, and which transfer should you watch?

title: 'Beyond repair': Napheesa Collier, Cathy Engelbert and a WNBA teetering on the brink
content: Amid the WNBA Finals, two of the most powerful people in the game are locked in a contentious battle -- for public opinion, power and money.

title: Is it time to worry about Mohamed Salah at Liverpool?
content: There is a lot of uncertainty around this new-look Liverpool side right now, but one thing we know for sure: if Salah doesn't play like himself soon, nothing else matters.

title: Portland peaking, KC's unbeaten run hits 16
content: Kansas City is out of sight at the top of ESPN's NWSL Power Rankings, but behind the Current, Portland is rounding into form at just the right time.

title: The 49ers are finding ways to win -- thanks to (receiver?) Christian McCaffrey
content: While the 49ers have not been productive on the ground, their running back has been producing through the air.

title: Fantasy football rest-of-season rankings: Smith-Njigba and Egbuka enter top 10
content: Eric Karabell updates his fantasy rankings at every position for the remainder of the season, including his overall top 100.

title: Fred VanVleet injury: Four things to know about its impact on Rockets, Durant
content: Our NBA insiders broke down the injury's impact on the team, its players and what Houston could do to bolster its lineup.

title: Miami dominance and a UCLA stunner: Recapping a chaotic Week 6
content: In Week 6, the Grim Reaper came for Penn State and Texas, but Miami proved itself against Florida State.

title: Should you bet on Miami QB Carson Beck for the Heisman?
content: As the odds shift for the Heisman Trophy and national championship, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet them heading into Week 7.

title: After regaining the light heavyweight belt at UFC 320, Alex Pereira should move to heavyweight
content: Now that Pereira is a champ again, the UFC should give the fans the heavyweight blockbuster they want.

title: Five position battles to watch during NBA preseason
content: With the NBA preseason under way, Eric Moody highlights the key position battles that fantasy managers need to watch closely.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona to move for Adeyemi
content: Borussia Dortmund forward Karim Adeyemi is on the radar of Barcelona ahead of next season. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: TGL Season 2 schedule: How to watch matches on ESPN networks
content: The tech-infused golf league, fronted by Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy, plays its matches at SoFi Center in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida.

title: 44% drop: How number of Indian students going to US has declined
content: Student arrivals from India fell 44 percent, the sharpest fall among all major source countries. Overall international student arrivals to the US dropped 19 percent, indicating that the fall among Indians is far steeper than the global average. The downturn follows a smaller decline last year, showing a continuing trend rather than a one-time disruption.

title: Texas 'invades' Illinois: Trump’s move sparks uproar - is US headed for a new civil war?
content: Texas National Guard troops deployed to Chicago, sparking fears of a new Civil War, with political leaders on both sides accusing each other of inciting conflict. This escalation follows a federal judge's decision to allow the deployment, despite objections from Illinois' Democratic leaders, as President Trump warned of using the Insurrection Act.

title: Bihar elections: How NDA plans to counter oppn caste-based drive; banks on ‘Viksit Bihar’
content: The NDA, led by BJP and JDU, anticipates a strong victory in Bihar polls, campaigning on a platform of development and good governance, aiming to move past the 'Jungle Raj' era. Opinion polls project a landslide win for the alliance, while the opposition INDIA bloc is expected to focus on caste-based politics.

title: Microsoft names new CEO: Nadella steps back from daily ops; commerce gets chief
content: Microsoft has promoted Judson Althoff to CEO of its commercial business, a significant move allowing CEO Satya Nadella to focus solely on AI innovation and technical development. This reorganization unifies sales, marketing, and operations under Althoff, aiming to bolster Microsoft's position in the competitive AI landscape and drive future growth.

title: Infighting among trustees: Tata group leaders meet Amit Shah, Sitharaman
content: Top Tata group leaders, including Noel Tata and N Chandrasekaran, met with Union Ministers Amit Shah and Nirmala Sitharaman to discuss internal disputes over board appointments and governance. The disagreements within Tata Trusts, which controls a majority stake in Tata Sons, are reportedly impacting the conglomerate's operations.

title: Heavy rains in Delhi-NCR: 15 flights diverted; airlines issue advisory
content: Flight operations at Delhi Airport may be impacted due to inclement weather conditions, including heavy rain and thunderstorms on Tuesday. The airport authority advised passengers to check with airlines for updates and consider alternative transport like the Delhi Metro. The India Meteorological Department issued yellow and orange alerts for the region.

title: Spartan mentality! 'There's no room for mediocrity': Varun on coach Gambhir
content: Varun Chakravarthy credits Gautam Gambhir for instilling a “Spartan mentality” in Team India, leaving no room for mediocrity. The mystery spinner thrived on his international comeback, starring in the ICC Champions Trophy and Asia Cup with key wickets. Partnering effectively with Kuldeep Yadav, Varun emphasized his attacking role, strategy in death overs, and the importance of specialists in T20 cricket, highlighting the trust and guidance from Gambhir and Suryakumar Yadav.

title: Career advice: Amazon founder Bezos to young people; ‘go work at McDonald’s’
content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos advises young aspiring entrepreneurs to gain foundational experience by working at McDonald's. He emphasizes that such roles teach crucial skills like responsibility, discipline, and customer interaction, which are vital for long-term success and often overlooked by Gen Z in their pursuit of rapid startup growth.

title: PM Modi dials Putin to extend birthday wishes, says looking forward to hosting him in India
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated Russian President Putin on his 73rd birthday, reaffirming commitment to deepen the special and privileged strategic partnership. Both leaders reviewed bilateral progress, with PM Modi looking forward to hosting President Putin for the upcoming Annual Summit in New Delhi. Putin expressed confidence in India's sovereign decisions and PM Modi's leadership.

title: From Gmail to Zoho: Email switch made easy; guide for effortless migration
content: Zoho Mail is emerging as a popular privacy-focused alternative to Gmail, especially for professionals and small businesses. The service offers custom domain support, an ad-free interface, and enhanced privacy. This guide outlines a simple process to migrate your emails, folders, and contacts from Gmail to Zoho Mail, ensuring no data loss.

title: Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum’s net worth: How rich is Dubai’s ruler?
content: Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the Ruler of Dubai, has transformed the city into a global hub for luxury and innovation. His vision and ambition have led to iconic landmarks like the Burj Khalifa and Palm Jumeirah, solidifying his legacy as a transformative leader.

title: Can gold grow on trees? Scientists find nature’s hidden gold-making process
content: Finnish researchers discovered tiny gold nanoparticles within Norway spruce needles, a process seemingly driven by microbes. Specific bacteria, living in biofilms inside the needles, transform soluble gold from soil into solid particles. This groundbreaking finding could revolutionize gold exploration, making it greener and more sustainable by using plants as indicators and potentially for metal recovery.

title: Tit for tat? Now, TMC claims Tripura office 'attacked by BJP-backed goons' - video
content: Tensions flared as TMC accused BJP-backed goons of attacking its Tripura office, hours after BJP alleged TMC workers targeted its MPs and MLAs in West Bengal. The BJP claimed its MLA was attacked while distributing flood relief, drawing condemnation from Prime Minister Modi. West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee met with an affected BJP MP.

title: Lauren Kyle’s heartfelt message after McDavid signs $25M extension
content: Connor McDavid's wife, Lauren Kyle, celebrated his new contract with the Edmonton Oilers. Her reaction mirrored fan relief and pride. The deal offers the team financial flexibility. Kyle's ventures, including Bar Trove, show her commitment to Edmonton. Their life and legacy are growing in the city, strengthening their bond with the community.

title: Steph Curry's wife Ayesha makes huge revelation about marriage
content: Ayesha Curry, wife of NBA star Steph Curry, revealed her personal journey. Initially focused on her career, she shifted her priorities to family after marriage and motherhood. Later, she rediscovered her own goals and built a successful career in culinary arts and business. She also co-runs a foundation with Steph Curry.

title: Who is Mark Sanchez’s wife? Meet Perry Mattfeld of ‘Shameless’
content: Former NFL star Mark Sanchez and actress Perry Mattfeld, who began their romance in 2017, celebrated their May 2023 wedding in Mexico. Their journey, marked by long-distance and shared passions, culminated in a joyous union. The couple, who welcomed twins in March 2025, continues to build their life together, showcasing a strong partnership.

title: 'Ek baar phirse dulha...': Shikhar Dhawan teases Yuzvendra Chahal – watch
content: Cricketers Shikhar Dhawan and Yuzvendra Chahal have created a viral Instagram reel. The video features Bollywood-style humor and a popular dialogue. Their natural comic timing has impressed fans. The duo is known for their engaging social media content. This collaboration highlights their strong friendship and entertainment skills beyond cricket. Their chemistry continues to captivate followers.

title: Shoe hurled at CJI: Attacker says acted on God's will; Gavai's mother issues 'anarchy' warning
content: Supreme Court advocate Rakesh Kishore, who allegedly attempted to throw a shoe at CJI Gavai, claimed, “The Almighty made it happen... I was just a witness.” He cited a remark mocking Sanatan Dharma. CJI’s mother condemned the act, urging peace. PM Modi called the CJI, saying the attack “has angered every Indian” and praised his composure.

title: 'Ongoing continuously': India-US in contact at various levels for trade deal
content: India is actively engaged in discussions with the US for a Bilateral Trade Agreement, with Union Minister Piyush Goyal indicating ongoing contact at various levels. Meanwhile, India is pursuing a Free Trade Agreement with the European Union, with both sides expressing optimism for an equitable and balanced pact, aiming for completion by year-end.

title: ‘Kantara Chapter 1’: Makers urge fans not to imitate ‘Daiva’ characters
content: Following fan imitation of 'Daiva' characters from 'Kantara: Chapter 1', makers Hombale Films issued a statement. They emphasized the film's respectful portrayal of the sacred tradition and appealed to the public to cease mimicking or trivializing these revered figures, citing deep hurt to religious sentiments within the Tulu community.

title: Parkinson’s risk may rise with restless legs syndrome: Know signs and management
content: New research indicates a significant link between Restless Legs Syndrome (RLS) and an increased risk of developing Parkinson's disease (PD). A study in JAMA Network Open suggests RLS may serve as an early indicator of neurodegenerative changes, affecting millions globally. While no cure exists, management strategies for RLS are available.

title: Trump reacts on Mark Sanchez stabbing case as truck driver faces felony charges
content: Former NFL quarterback Mark Sanchez faces serious felony battery charges after a violent altercation in Indianapolis left him and a 69-year-old truck driver, Perry Tole, severely injured. The incident, reportedly stemming from a parking dispute, saw Sanchez allegedly attempt to enter Tole's truck before Tole used a knife. President Trump described Sanchez as 'a nice guy' amidst the 'crazy' situation.

title: 'There's nothing serious': Mamata on condition of injured BJP MP Khagen Murmu - watch
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee visited BJP MP Khagen Murmu in a Siliguri hospital after he was attacked in Nagarkata. Murmu was assaulted while visiting flood-hit areas. The incident has triggered a political dispute, with the BJP blaming the TMC and the ruling party accusing the BJP of seeking publicity.

title: PM to inaugurate Navi Mum Airport on Wed- all you need to know about Rs 19k cr project
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to inaugurate Phase 1 of the Navi Mumbai International Airport on Wednesday. This massive Rs 19,650 crore project, India's largest Greenfield airport, aims to ease congestion at Mumbai's existing airport.

title: Saaniya Chandhok stars in Sara Tendulkar's new video; internet reacts - watch
content: Cricketer Arjun Tendulkar's sister, Sara, shared a heartwarming video of herself and Arjun's fiancée, Saaniya Chandhok, with their pet dogs, delighting fans. This follows Arjun's 26th birthday celebrations, where Sara posted a playful throwback picture weeks back. The engagement, confirmed by Sachin Tendulkar, has kept fans invested in the family's personal moments, including in this latest post.

title: 'We fear for her life': German town mayor found stabbed at home
content: A newly elected German town mayor, Iris Stalzer, was found severely wounded after a stabbing attack near her home. Chancellor Friedrich Merz condemned the incident as a "heinous act," expressing fears for her life. Stalzer, a member of the Social Democratic Party, was elected just last month. Her son reportedly discovered her seriously injured.

title: Mumbai: Wife no. 2 says husband 'kidnapped'; found in rehab on order of wife no. 1
content: A Mumbai builder, Chandrakant Bhunu, was reported kidnapped by his second wife, but police found him at a rehabilitation center. The "kidnappers" were employees of the center, hired by Bhunu's first wife who orchestrated the intervention due to his alcoholism. The incident began as a kidnapping drama but concluded as a wellness retreat.

title: 'Sky is the limit': Bhambri on rediscovering belief after US Open SF run — Exclusive!
content: Yuki Bhambri’s US Open 2025 campaign wasn’t just a career milestone — it was a statement. Teaming up again with longtime friend Michael Venus after a decade, the Indian ace reached his first Grand Slam semi-final in men’s doubles. From struggles to rediscovering belief, Yuki Bhambri tells TimesofIndia.com how 'it all clicked' in New York.

title: Haryana IPS officer dies by suicide; no note, police scramble for answers
content: Senior Haryana IPS officer Y Puran Kumar, ADGP, reportedly died by suicide at his official residence in Chandigarh. The incident occurred at his government accommodation, with police cordoning off the area and recovering the weapon. Kumar was recently transferred to Sunaria Jail, which houses Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh.

title: Tempers flare! Prithvi loses cool, swings bat at Musheer - Watch
content: Prithvi Shaw's magnificent 181 in a warm-up match against his former team Mumbai ended in controversy after he was involved in a heated altercation with bowler Musheer Khan and teammate Siddhesh Lad. Shaw's century, alongside Arshin Kulkarni's 186, showcased a strong batting resurgence for the opener.

title: Nobel Physics Prize for beginners: How 3 physicists built the real 'quantum world'
content: The 2025 Nobel Prize in Physics was handed out to people for pulling off what Marvel writers only pretend to understand: showing that quantum weirdness isn’t confined to subatomic particles. They built real-world circuits that behave like quantum beings — tunnelling through barriers, jumping between energy levels, and proving that Schrödinger’s cat may not be alive or dead, but quantum physics is alive and kicking.

title: Who is Khaled El-Enany? Egyptian set to become Unesco’s first Arab Director-General
content: Egypt's former Tourism Minister, Dr. Khaled El-Enany, is poised to make history as the first Arab candidate nominated for UNESCO Director-General. His strong nomination by the Executive Board now awaits a final vote from member states in November. El-Enany, an Egyptologist and heritage expert, aims to champion global heritage and intercultural understanding.

title: UFC legend Rampage Jackson's son charged after alleged attack on wrestler
content: Raja Jackson, son of UFC legend Rampage Jackson, faces felony and misdemeanor battery charges after a violent altercation at a wrestling event. Jackson allegedly attacked fellow wrestler Syko Stu, causing serious injury, and was later arrested. His father has expressed disappointment and has not spoken to his son since the incident.

title: Bengaluru filmmaker Hemant arrested over actress’s allegations of sexual misconduct
content: Kannada actor-director-producer B. Hemant Kumar was arrested by Bengaluru Police following a television actress's complaint of sexual harassment, cheating, and blackmail. The actress alleges he spiked her drink, filmed her, and used the footage for extortion, alongside threats and defamation. Investigations are ongoing after the arrest.

title: Former PM HD Deve Gowda admitted to Bengaluru hospital due to infection
content: Former Prime Minister and Rajya Sabha MP HD Deve Gowda has been admitted to Manipal Hospital in Bengaluru following an infection. The 92-year-old Janata Dal (Secular) leader developed a fever, and a team of medical experts is closely monitoring his condition. Family sources confirmed his hospitalisation, with further details anticipated.

title: Tiwary’s bombshell: Gambhir behind exit of India greats — 'He made sure they’re gone'
content: Former cricketer Manoj Tiwary has criticized coach Gautam Gambhir, alleging he created an environment that led to the retirements of Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, and R Ashwin. Tiwary believes Gambhir's coaching style has caused controversies and negatively impacted Indian cricket, questioning the exclusion of senior players.

title: BJP says another leader 'attacked' in West Bengal during flood-relief drive; TMC terms it 'baseless'
content: BJP MLA Manoj Kumar Oraon was allegedly attacked by TMC workers in Alipurduar while distributing flood relief, a day after two senior BJP leaders were assaulted in Jalpaiguri. The TMC denied the allegations, claiming Oraon assaulted an elderly man first. Prime Minister Modi condemned the attacks, criticizing the TMC's insensitivity and the state's law and order.

title: The veteran, the challenger, the disruptor: Nitish faces rough poll pitch; RJD, PK loom large
content: The INDIA bloc faces an uphill battle in Bihar, aiming to regain national momentum after recent BJP victories. Despite opposition efforts and a statewide campaign, the BJP-JD(U) combine leverages incumbency and caste engineering. The opposition hopes to capitalize on discontent among Muslim voters and doubts about Nitish Kumar's leadership.

title: Shocking! Dhoni to move away from CSK? Viral photo causes meltdown
content: MS Dhoni surprised fans by appearing in a Mumbai Indians jersey during a football match, a stark contrast to his Chennai Super Kings legacy. This unexpected sight follows his recent heartwarming interaction with Kapil Dev and Rohit Sharma at an event. The images have sparked considerable social media discussion, leaving many wondering about the veteran's future.

title: Taylor Swift’s 2008 post about Keri Russell goes viral again
content: Keri Russell was delighted on The Tonight Show when Jimmy Fallon revealed Taylor Swift's 2008 MySpace bio calling her the "coolest celebrity ever." Russell recalled Swift's kindness from their early meeting, a heartwarming moment amidst Swift's current global fame with Travis Kelce. The interview also touched on Russell's hit show, The Diplomat, and its upcoming season.

title: Pakistan's economic recovery a myth? Millions still struggle in poverty
content: Pakistan's economic recovery is not reaching its people. Millions face poverty and inequality despite government claims of growth. Household well-being has worsened. Rural areas suffer more. Employment remains a challenge. Reforms have stabilized the economy but not improved living standards. True progress means better lives for ordinary citizens.

title: Cough syrup death toll rises to 17 in Madhya Pradesh
content: Nine children who consumed adulterated Coldrif are under treatment for kidney failure; doctors begin indefinite strike in protest against arrest of paediatrician who prescribed the syrup; they seek action against drug manufacturer and those who approved its use

title: Supreme Court issues notice on plea to remove Assam BJP’s video ‘vilifying’ Muslims
content: The video post from BJP Assam unit’s X handle shows Muslims ‘taking over’ the State in the scenario that BJP is not elected to power in the upcoming Assembly elections

title: AIDSO condemns State govt. decision to extend school holidays for survey
content: ‘The step taken is undemocratic and it will become a hurdle in ensuring quality education in government and aided schools’

title: Cash transfer token gesture, doesn’t address real issues in Bihar: CPI(ML)-L leader Dipankar Bhattacharya
content: CPI(ML)-Liberation, a constituent of the grand alliance in Bihar, says the Nitish Kumar government paid no heed to the people’s voices while acquiring land for a power plant in Pirpainti; the party’s general secretary Dipankar Bhattacharya says the BJP’s communal politics is “calculated” and the saffron party is penetrating Bihar in a “dangerous way”; he says the Opposition needs to organise a better campaign, but time is “running out”

title: Rajya Sabha Chairman C.P. Radhakrishnan meets floor leaders, seeks cooperation
content: Opposition members spoke of the deterioration of relations with Treasury, pressed for more time for the Opposition on the floor of the House

title: ‘No State has fully complied with key drug quality norms’
content: Corrective and Preventive Action (CAPA) guidelines form a critical part of Centre’s revised pharmaceutical manufacturing regulations

title: Serving Mother India the greatest honour: PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, who entered the 25th year in public service, said the “accomplishment in a democratic system is a great blessing from the people of India”

title: Don’t blame the govt., be the innovation: Krishna Ella tells graduates at UoH convocation
content: India, once admired for its pioneering spirit and ingenuity, has become hesitant to take risks, says Bharat Biotech CMD Krishna Ella while addressing graduates at the University of Hyderabad; urges the youth to revive India’s legacy of imagination, entrepreneurship and fearless experimentation to reclaim its place as a global innovator

title: CM and ministers weigh pros and cons as the High Court is set to hear case on local body reservations
content: According to sources, the Chief Minister expressed confidence that the High Court would take a positive view of the government’s decision to provide 42% reservations to BCs in local body elections

title: TTD to conduct ‘Deepavali Asthanam’ on October 20
content: The customary ritual will be organised between 7 a.m. and 9 a.m. to the deities of Lord Malayappa Swamy and His consorts mounted atop the ‘Sarva Bhoopala vahanam’ at Bangaru Vakili

title: Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy invited for Sri Sathya Sai Baba’s birth centenary celebrations
content: Managing Trustee of Sri Sathya Sai Central Trust Rathnakar calls on Revanth Reddy and extends him an invitation; the Chief Minister recalls the monumental water projects executed by Sri Sathya Sai Baba in Medak and Mahabubnagar districts

title: Paediatricians unhappy about advisory on cough medications for young children
content: State Health department is in the process of formulating clear-cut guidelines on the management of cough illnesses in children, says Health department

title: Bajra can be sown before Bengal gram in the rabi season, says expert
content: Farmers can expect yields of 15–20 quintals per acre, translating to a net income of around ₹25,000 per acre, says ANGRAU Director of Research

title: Uttarakhand Governor gives nod for Minority Education Bill; State to abolish Madrasa Board
content: The decision is a historic step towards making the education system in Uttarakhand equitable and modern, says Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami

title: BJP lays siege to Thrissur Corporation office over neglect of Central projects
content: Party accuses Mayor and Corporation of blocking Suresh Gopi’s development funds for political reasons

title: Andhra Pradesh Urban Development Minister Narayana insists on effective waste management
content: The government is according top priority to urban infrastructure development, he tells Municipal Commissioners; he directs officials to allot completed TIDCO houses to the beneficiaries every Saturday, and complete construction of the remaining by  June next

title: Teachers stage massive protest in Vijayawada, demand resolution of long-pending issues
content: Thousands participate in Poru Bata protest, demanding release of pending dues, pay revision, service rule reforms, and better retirement benefits for teachers.

title: TSF Group eyes ₹32,000 cr. in manufacturing revenue by 2030
content: It is also planning to raise Sundaram Finance Group’s assets under management (AUM) to ₹4 lakh crore from ₹1.5 lakh crore

title: Supreme Court flags ‘dire need’ to protect pedestrians, gives States six months to frame road safety rules
content: Authorities have been directed to address aspects such as helmet compliance, lane discipline, and the use of dazzling LED headlights while framing the guidelines

title: Efforts under way to form Swachh Sevaks in State: Pattabhiram
content: The Swachh Andhra Corporation Chairman says every awardee is a brand ambassador for cleanliness and urges citizens to work together to make the State a model of Swachh Andhra

title: Bharath assures to solve decade-old problems of Kurnool city
content: Lays foundation stones for development works worth ₹4.33 crore in the city; government taking steps to provide basic facilities in all the wards of the corporation, says Industries and Commerce Minister

title: Report identifies capital city as emerging strategic hub for GCCs
content: Report points at Thiruvananthapuram’s transformation into a strategic epicentre for the digital economy, driven by its IT ecosystem

title: ACB Court extends judicial remand of IPS officer Sanjay till October 17
content: The former AP CID chief and Director-General of Fire Services has been arrested on charges of misappropriation of funds

title: More BC Gurukul schools to come up in State, says Minister
content: Savitha assures that the government will strive for the inclusion of Valmikis in STs and TDP is the only party that priorities social, political and economic upliftment of the community

title: State to launch low-carbon rice farming initiative
content: Three-day workshop on ‘Catalysing Transitions to Low-Emission Rice-Based Systems in Kerala’ to be held

title: Nellore Collector assures to form panel to prevent student suicides
content: Members of Parents Association of Andhra Pradesh request Himanshu Shukla to take immediate and strict measures to protect the students from suicidal tendencies

title: MNC opens free-for-all public library in Hyderabad’s IT corridor
content: Located on 8th floor of Pranava Business Park in Kondapur residential area, the library spanning 15,660 sq.ft. is air-conditioned, aesthetically designed and has about 15,000 books across genres

title: Bihar SIR: Supreme Court asks EC to be transparent about names added and deleted in the final electoral roll
content: Confusion about whether names added in final list are those deleted from draft roll, says SC; asks if EC individually informed excluded voters, to aid their right to appeal; EC says no complaints about exclusions yet

title: BNHS team to visit Rollapadu Bird Sanctuary on October 10
content: The visit is aimed at making a scientific study and to suggest remedial measures for the conservation of the Great Indian Bustards in the sanctuary

title: Andhra Pradesh govt. vows to address Kolleru region’s long-standing issues and development needs
content: High-level review maps critical challenges across 10 mandals; officials told to fast-track resolution of forest, irrigation land disputes and flood safety works

title: ‘The Ramayana is a great inspiration for generations to come’
content: Colourful processions, lectures and other programmes mark the birth anniversary of saint-poet Maharshi Valmiki in several districts

title: 15 Killed After Bus Hit By Landslide In Himachal's Bilaspur District
content: At least 10 people were killed after a bus was buried under the debris of a massive landslide triggered in Himachal Pradesh's Bilaspur district late Tuesday evening.

title: Video: Huge Traffic Jam In Gurugram, Flight Advisories In Delhi After Heavy Rain
content: Heavy rain caused a massive traffic jam in Gurugram this evening. A video shows never-ending rows of cars, moving at a snail's pace, spanning several kilometres.

title: On CCTV, Man Attacks Passengers With Machete On Odisha Bus
content: Several passengers were attacked with a sharp weapon inside a government-run bus in Odisha's Puri district today.

title: 15 Flights Diverted From Delhi Airport Due To Heavy Rain
content: At least 15 flights were diverted from the Delhi airport this evening due to heavy rain. Eight flights were diverted to Jaipur, five to Lucknow and two to Chandigarh.

title: Karnataka To Consider Inclusion Of 'Ramayana' To School Curriculum
content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah announced that the state government would consider including the 'Ramayana' and its author, 'Maharshi Valmiki', in the school curriculum in the state.

title: "Leaky Roof, Damp Walls": NDTV At Jaipur Hospital Where Fire Killed 6
content: Plaster peeling off, a leaky roof, and dampness covering the walls: the state of disrepair at Jaipur's SMS hospital's Trauma Center, where a fire broke out Sunday night, is on display.

title: 'Veggie Burgers' Face Grilling In European Parliament
content: Championed by green advocates as much as mindful eaters, the days of plant-based "steaks" and "veggie burgers" may be numbered under plans up for a vote in the European Parliament on Wednesday.

title: Over 60% Higher Education Institutions Permit Use Of AI Tools By Students: Report
content: Over 50 per cent of higher education institutions in India are using generative AI to develop learning materials while 60 per cent of them are permitting student use of AI tools, according to a new report based on a survey of 30 leading HEIs.

title: Probe Agency Cracks Down On Rs 30 Crore Marriage Scheme Scam In Madhya Pradesh
content: In a major crackdown on financial fraud, the Directorate of Enforcement, Bhopal, conducted search operations on October 3 across seven locations in Bhopal, Vidisha, Katni, and Chhatarpur districts.

title: Jaguar Land Rover To Resume Some UK Output After Cyberattack
content: Jaguar Land Rover will restart some production at its UK sites from Wednesday after a damaging cyberattack halted operations for more than a month, the automaker said Tuesday.

title: Centre Announces On-Device Biometric Authentication For UPI Transactions, More Features
content: The government announced several new offerings like UPI with on-device biometric authentication for a seamless, secure and user-friendly alternative to PIN-based UPI authentication.

title: Iraqi Child With Heart Beating 200 Times Per Minute Undergoes Life-Saving Surgery In Delhi
content: A seven-year-old Iraqi boy suffering from persistent, fast heart rhythm with fatal consequences successfully underwent a life-saving procedure at a hospital here amid extreme caution owing to his young age and low body weight.

title: Gen Z Drinking Less Alcohol, Health Benefits To Last Longer: Study
content: Younger generations, particularly Generation Z, are turning away from alcohol at unprecedented rates, according to a study.

title: TikTok Star Aurelien Fontenoy Hops Up Eiffel Tower On Cycle In 12 Minutes, Sets World Record
content: A French cyclist and social media influencer has set a new world record, cycling up the Eiffel Tower's 686 steps in 12 minutes and 30 seconds.

title: 5 Buses Broke Down Every Hour, Every Day In Delhi In 2 Years: Data
content: Over 112 DTC buses broke down on average every day in Delhi over the last two years, with more than 81,000 breakdowns reported by different depots of the public transporter, according to data obtained through an RTI query by PTI.

title: "Signing Off From Life": Engineering Student Dies By Suicide After Writing Instagram Post
content: A 17-year-old engineering student died by suicide on the campus of his college after venting his frustration with life on social media.

title: Karnataka Caste Census Survey To Be Completed By October 19: Siddaramaiah
content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah has announced that the Social-Economic and Academic Survey, commonly known as the Caste Census, will be completed by October 19.

title: Grain Ready, Government Is Not: Farmers On Paddy Procurement In Chhattisgarh
content: The lush green fields of Chhattisgarh are shimmering with ripened paddy, but the political heat around procurement has begun to rise faster than the harvest.

title: Office Leasing Down 6% In July-September In Top 8 Cities: Report
content: Leasing of office spaces fell 6 per cent across top eight cities during September quarter on lower demand amid global uncertainties, Knight Frank said, but asserted that the full calendar year will see a record absorption of workspaces.

title: Senior Haryana IPS Officer Shoots Himself At His House In Chandigarh
content: Puran Kumar, a senior Haryana IPS officer, died by suicide at his Sector 11 Chandigarh residence by shooting himself, said officials.

title: MMA divisional rankings: Pereira punches his ticket in light heavyweight top 10
content: no fewer than 13 ranked fighters in action between the UFC 320 and the PFL Champions Series . half of the light heavyweight top 10 has a new no. 1 in the wake of reclaiming the title he had lost to Magomed Ankalaev in march . there is ranking movement in six weight classes, the most notable being youssef Zalal .

title: Sorting out the bowl picture after another weekend of surprises
content: two preseason college football playoff contenders lost to opponents who had disappointed . last season's inaugural 12-team CFP, the five highest-ranked conference champions will make the field . the other eight teams will meet in first-round games at the campus sites of seeds Nos. 5 through 8 .

title: Lawrence, Mahomes have big rushing performances
content: the Jacksonville Jaguars beat the Kansas City Chiefs 31-28 at EverBank Stadium . quarterback Trevor Lawrence completed 18 of 25 passes for 221 yards and a touchdown . the last-second victory over the Chiefs snapped an eight-game losing streak in the series .

title: What's up with Arch Manning? Coaches who have faced him and worked with him weigh in
content: a third-year player has been taunted and clapped back . the quarterback has been booed by road and home fans alike . he has also brought snippets of joy to those wearing Burnt Orange .

title: WWE Crown Jewel: Key stats and info to know before Saturday's premium live event
content: the premium live event (PLE) will be headlined by a pair of matches for the men's and women's crown jewel championships . undisputed WWE champion Cody Rhodes will challenge world heavyweight champion seth Rollins in one match .

title: Everyone suddenly wants to be World Heavyweight Champion
content: jey Uso, CM Punk and LA Knight are not-so-patiently waiting for a title shot . the current champion, seth Rollins, is focused on bringing home crown jewel hardware . he has yet to beat cody Rhodes in the world heavyweight championship .

title: UFC 320 fight grades: A really good main card saves an otherwise mediocre slate
content: pereira's first-round knockout over Magomed Ankalaev was a tale of two fight cards . the main card featured a sure-to-be banger between Khalil Rountree Jr. and Ji Procházka .

title: The unraveling of Barcelona has been weeks in the making
content: defending champions laLiga have lost 4-1 to sevilla at the emirates stadium . the defeat was their worst performance under Hansi Flick, says Craig Burley . he says the defeat would have been different if he hadn't fluffed a penalty .

title: Sark defends culture at Texas after latest flop
content: Steve Sarkisian says his team's mindset is all there, so that tells him the culture's right . the longhorns lost 3-2 to the allstate Red River Rivalry on saturday . his comments came two days after the loss of 3-2 with Saturday's 29th win .

title: Is it better to have an early or late bye week? The answer may surprise you
content: the Texans beat a short-handed Ravens team 44-10 in a bye week . coach Mike Macdonald scheduled a meeting with all three of his coordinators and assistant head coach Leslie Frazier . source: "you can reset your team [during the bye] if you do it the right way"

title: NHL season preview: X factors and predictions for all 32 teams
content: the opening night of the 2025-26 NHL season is Tuesday . this preview will serve you all the key intel you need on all 32 teams, including strengths, weaknesses, X factors, most likely award winners, fantasy tips and a bold prediction .
